output: 1. Marginal improvement in parameter efficiency (0.87x inference params of VITS) and inference speed (1.5x faster than VITS)
2. The motivation of a differentiable aligner is not well addressed in the result section.
3. In Figure 3, the F0 contour of EFTS2 does not seem stable. Please provide the samples with diverse t1 and t2.
4. Why not provide multi-speaker TTS results for EFTS 2-VC even though it uses a text encoder?
1. Synthesis efficiency improved, but the quality seems to have degraded.
